Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Thoughts on Google's Monopoly It's often said that Google has a monopoly on search. And it certainly has incredible market dominance. According to statcounter Google has a 91% market share across desktop and mobile. But Google can't raise prices. If they charged even a penny perâ€¦
